item.description: Join us to learn the fundamentals of the Joomla content management system (CMS) (http://www.joomla.org.... The Joomla CMS is designed to let non-technical users create extensive, professional web sites. We will examine it from both a pure WYSIWYG content management / out of box configuration standpoint, as well as what is needed for some basic development on top of the platform and how the platform can be extended with a wide range of add-ons. All we ask is that you bring an inquisitive mind. We look forward to seeing everyone!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting at the entrance of the building.

group.name: The Boston Computing Review Meetup Group

item.name: Joomla Content Management and Development Basics
